INVALID_DOMAIN.message: Invalid domain, must be alphanumeric and lower case

INVALID_LABEL.message: Invalid label, must be alphanumeric and lower case

DOMAIN_NOT_EXISTS.message: The given domain does not exist

NO_ACCOUNTS_TO_SIGN.message: There are no accounts to sign the transaction

NO_SET_ADDR.message: The resolver does not implements setAddr method

NO_TLD_OWNER.message: The given TLD does not exists

NO_AVAILABLE_METHOD.message: The owner of the TLD does not implement the available method

NO_REVERSE_REGISTRAR.message: ReverseRegistrar contract address has not been provided in the constructor of the library

NO_SET_NAME_METHOD.message: The reverse registrar does not implement setName method

NO_SET_CHAIN_ADDR.message: The resolver does not implement setChainAddr method
